body_html: If you say data = ["//tensorflow/python", "//tensorflow/contrib:contrib_py"] then pretty much everything you should need, including the __init__.py files, will be available in the runfiles directory.
body_text: If you say data = ["//tensorflow/python", "//tensorflow/contrib:contrib_py"] then pretty much everything you should need, including the __init__.py files, will be available in the runfiles directory.
body: If you say `data = ["//tensorflow/python", "//tensorflow/contrib:contrib_py"]` then pretty much everything you should need, including the `__init__.py` files, will be available in the runfiles directory.
